item.title: Seeking Your Love - DJ La Rocca
item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:
Wow dude, thatâ€™s some good stuff. I can tell you put a lot of attention to detail. I really love the way you used the sweeper throughout your song. Especially the transitions. I thought the pre-snare was pretty creative as well. The piano was good. I just think the jumpy off beat bass line needed different sound selection though. The intro needed some work but everything else is superb.
